column4: Can anyone here help me out in burning the Dapper Drake CD; im having issues with burning it
what kind of issues?

Well I'm on mac right; and half the times I try to burn it using one of a variety or tries it has an error or doesnt work.. OR when I put it into Toast, it comes up as almost 1.5 gigs in size because it seems there's a folder IN the iso that is called ubuntu itself and 700 mb in size
Basically; I can't get a damn CD of 6.06!
ok, well i run ubuntu on my mac ... are you doing the same or are you on OS X?
Mada: Im trying to burn it for my windows (x86) tower.. but i'm trying to burn the CD itself on the mac for the PC
ok, so you have the image on the hard drive of the mac?
Yes. I downloaded the .iso, and it was mounted and appears as a drive in the finder.
ok, open finder click on applications, double click on "utilities", then double click on "disk manager" and tell me when that opens up
Mada: Ok in DiskUtility on the left I see the ubuntu .iso and under it is the mounted drive version of the .iso
ok, click on the non-mounted icon of the iso
Ok. Clicked :P
ok, then the little "burn
oops
then the little "burn" icon at the top should light up just like in iTunes when you burn a cd
It did, and I put in a CD now and i'm burning it
:D Thank god. I was trying the burn folder and Toast and BurnX and just having so many damn problems
sweet, it takes a little longer to burn .iso's with disk util because it tripple checks everything, but it is definitely the fail safe way of doing so :)
Sweet. Thanks :P
no problem :)
